name: Item Failsafe
duration: Prolonged (this spell uses the advanced prolongation factors)
effect: The magician enchants an Imbued Item so that its spells are inaccessible to unauthorized users. One success is added to the target number per imbued spell that is to be protected from unauthorized users.

rotes.roteDescription: Though less punitive than other protective enchantments, Guardians prefer the simplicity inherent in simply forbidding interlopers to make use of their Imbued Items.
